name: Bird
headline: The worldâs largest omnichannel communications platform
description:
The worldâs largest omnichannel communications platform.

Bird CRM powers communication between businesses and their customers â across any channel, always with the right context, and on every corner of the planet. Its products and solutions are the foundational building blocks to business communications across preferred channels, like SMS, Voice, WhatsApp, WeChat, Messenger, Email and more. Founded in 2011, Bird connects to billions of devices and is trusted by nearly 20,000 customers worldwide.

Headquartered in Amsterdam, Bird operates across nine global hubs â including Singapore, Dublin, Shanghai, Sydney, London, Bogota and Asuncion â and is proud to be a âWork Anywhereâ company. Its team of 500 employees represent more than 55 nationalities.

generated_description:
**Bird: The Global Communications Powerhouse**

Bird is on a mission to establish itself as the world's largest omnichannel communications platform, and it’s making impressive strides towards that goal. Founded in 2011 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S16, Bird has positioned itself at the intersection of technology and communication.

Based in Amsterdam, Bird operates from nine global hubs including hotspots like Singapore, Sydney, and London—ensuring they’re well-connected to a diverse array of markets. With a multinational team that boasts around 500 employees from over 55 nationalities, Bird embodies a vibrant, inclusive culture and carries a “Work Anywhere” philosophy.

At its core, Bird empowers businesses by facilitating seamless communication across multiple channels. Whether through SMS, Voice, WhatsApp, or email, Bird ensures businesses connect meaningfully with their customers. Trusted by nearly 20,000 customers worldwide, Bird has forged connections to billions of devices—an impressive feat that solidifies its role in modern business communications.

The products and services Bird offers can be categorized into four main pillars:

1. **Reach**: This suite allows businesses to unify their communication strategies. Users can engage audiences effectively through a variety of channels, ensuring they are reached wherever they are, whenever they want. Key offerings include their Email API, SMS API, and WhatsApp API.
   
2. **Grow**: Bird doesn’t just stop at communication; it also helps businesses expand. Their marketing tools are tailored to assist in building targeted, data-driven campaigns. Meanwhile, their sales solutions focus on personalizing interactions for accelerated revenue growth.

3. **Manage**: No business can thrive in chaos. Bird’s management suite helps companies maintain order in their operations. With features for payments, expenses, and HR, it simplifies the complexities that come with running a business.

4. **Automate**: In an era where efficiency is king, Bird allows businesses to leverage AI to automate insights and streamline workflows. This empowers teams to focus on what truly matters by reducing time spent on repetitive tasks.

In summary, Bird is more than just a CRM; it’s a comprehensive communications platform designed for the modern business landscape. Its ability to facilitate communication, foster growth, manage operations, and enable automation makes it a compelling choice for enterprises looking to elevate their game. For more information, you can check out their website at [bird.com](http://bird.com). 

With Bird, companies can not only stay connected but thrive in a world where every message matters.
